resources.string: "Couldn't check for updates. Try again later."
No apps available to complete this action.
"You don't have any apps that can open this type of file. You can search for one in the Galaxy Store."
"You don't have any apps that can open this type of file. You can search for one in the Play Store."
To see how much space your apps are using, go to Settings and allow My Files to track your app usage.
Another process is already in progress. Waiting for this process to end…
Used to open and share files when using Bixby
Ask us to open Samsung Cloud
"Can't move the file to the Trash"
"Can't move the files to the Trash"
"Can't move the folder to the Trash"
"Can't move the folders to the Trash"
Clear some space in %s to restore the selected file.
Clear some space on your phone to restore this file.
Clear some space on your tablet to restore this file.
Clear some space in %s to restore the selected files.
Clear some space on your phone to restore these files.
Clear some space on your tablet to restore these files.
Clear some space in %s to restore the selected folder.
Clear some space on your phone to restore this folder.
Clear some space on your tablet to restore this folder.
Clear some space in %s to restore the selected folders.
Clear some space on your phone to restore these folders.
Clear some space on your tablet to restore these folders.
Clear some space in %s to restore the selected items.
Clear some space on your phone to restore these items.
Clear some space on your tablet to restore these items.
"You don't have permission to access this, or you need to ask Microsoft to reactivate your account."
Sign in to manage your files in %s.

"The current SD card format is FAT32. To store files larger than 4 GB, use a computer to convert the SD card to exFAT format.
The compression process will automatically be cancelled if the file becomes larger than 4 GB."

"The current SD card format is FAT32. To store files larger than 4 GB, use a computer to convert the SD card to exFAT format.
The compression process will automatically be cancelled if the file becomes larger than 4 GB."
"The compressed file will be %1$s %2$s, but there's only %3$s %4$s of space available."
Compressed file may be too large

"The size of the compressed file will be about %1$s %2$s, but there's only %3$s %4$s available in %5$s.
The compression process will automatically be cancelled if the file becomes larger than %6$s %7$s."
Connect to a network to access %s.

"The compressed file will likely be larger than the 4 GB size limit for FAT32-formatted USB storage devices.
If you continue, the compression will automatically be cancelled if the file gets larger than 4 GB. To avoid this limitation, convert your USB storage device to exFAT format using a computer."

"Your USB storage device is in FAT32 format, so it can't store files larger than 4 GB.
To store files larger than 4 GB, convert your USB storage device to exFAT format using a computer."
File transfer cancelled. Some items copied.
"You're trying to copy %1$s %2$s of files, but there's only %3$s %4$s of space available in %5$s."
"Couldn't move the file to the Trash"
"Get help clearing space if your device starts running out of room while you're traveling."
Less than 3 GB of space left
"Tap here to see what's taking up space on your phone."
"Tap here to see what's taking up space on your tablet."
This may slow down your phone. Delete some files to keep it running smoothly.
This may slow down your tablet. Delete some files to keep it running smoothly.
Destination folder is same as source folder.
The destination folder is a subfolder of the source folder.
Do this for all similar items
Started dragging the item at position %d.
Item at position %d cannot be dragged.
Gallery syncing with Samsung Cloud and file storage in Samsung Cloud Drive are ending on %s. Download your data before then to keep it safe.
"You can't copy files larger than %1$s to %2$s."
File is too large to copy
"You can't move files larger than %1$s to %2$s."
File is too large to move
"Can't move the folder. Destination folder is inside the folder being moved."
Failed to open file. File corrupted or other error occurred.
You already have a file named %s in the destination folder.
This file name is already in use.
File transfer cancelled. File not copied.
File transfer cancelled. File not moved.
File transfer cancelled. Files not copied.
File transfer cancelled. Files not moved.
File transfer cancelled. Folder not copied.
File transfer cancelled. Folder not moved.
File transfer cancelled. Folders not copied.
File transfer cancelled. Folders not moved.
File transfer cancelled. Items not copied.
File transfer cancelled. Items not moved.
You already have a folder named %s in the destination folder.
"To handle your personal data request, we've locked your Samsung Cloud."
"See what's taking up space on your phone."
"See what's taking up space on your tablet."
"Can't move more than %d files. Deselect files and try again."
"Remember to empty the Trash before removing your SD card to make sure anything you've added to the Trash is completely deleted."
Items in the Trash will be permanently deleted after 30 days.
"%s isn't available right now. Try again later."
Maximum number of selected files is %d.
Get personalized content based on how you use your phone.
Get personalized content based on how you use your tablet.
Keep deleted files and folders for 30 days.
Connect to a Wi-Fi or mobile network and try again.
File transfer cancelled. Some items moved.
"You're trying to move %1$s %2$s of files, but there's only %3$s %4$s of space available in %5$s."
"%1$s can't contain more than %2$d items. Delete some items and try again."
Navigate down to select a bulk action.
You need to download a viewer app to view this picture.
You need to download a viewer app to view this video.
A new version of %s is available.
Come back here later to see all the music, recordings, and more on your phone.
Come back here later to see all the music, recordings, and more on your tablet.
Zips, RARs, 7Zs, and more will be listed here so you can find them fast.
Word docs, PDF files, and other documents will be shown here.
Word docs, PDF files, and other documents will be shown here.
"We'll keep the files you download here so you can find them quickly."
Mark items as favourites so you can find them in a flash.
"There aren't any files on your SD card."
"There aren't any files on the attached USB device."
Add files to Google Drive to keep them safe and synced on all your devices.
"We'll collect all the pictures on your phone here so you can find them quickly."
"We'll collect all the pictures on your tablet here so you can find them quickly."
The files you use to install apps will be shown here.
The files you use to install apps will be shown here.
Add files to OneDrive to keep them safe and synced on all your devices.
Any files that you open or download will appear here.
Add files to %s to keep them safe and synced on all your devices.
After you insert an SD card, the files it contains will appear here.
"Any files or folders you delete will stay in the Trash for 30 days before they're deleted forever."
Keep track of all the movies and videos on your phone here.
Keep track of all the movies and videos on your tablet here.
None of the apps on your phone can open this type of file.
None of the apps on your tablet can open this type of file.
To download or edit your %s files, connect to Wi-Fi or turn on Allow mobile data usage in Settings.
Not enough memory. Delete some items.
"There's not enough space on your phone."
"There's not enough space on your tablet."
End of service. Tap to choose files to download.
This file is in internal storage, which is full. Permanently delete this file from your internal storage?
These files are in internal storage, which is full. Permanently delete these files from your internal storage?
This folder is in internal storage, which is full. Permanently delete this folder from your internal storage?
These folders are in internal storage, which is full. Permanently delete these folders from your internal storage?
These items are in internal storage, which is full. Permanently delete these items from your internal storage?
This file is on your SD card, which is full. Permanently delete this file from your SD card?
These files are on your SD card, which is full. Permanently delete these files from your SD card?
This folder is on your SD card, which is full. Permanently delete this folder from your SD card?
These folders are on your SD card, which is full. Permanently delete these folders from your SD card?
These items are on your SD card, which is full. Permanently delete these items from your SD card?
Restore this file to open it.
Restore this folder to open it.
"Opening the Galaxy Store… To use network storage, you need to download the Network Storage Manager."
"Opening the Galaxy Store… To use network storage, you need to update the Network Storage Manager and My Files."
"Opening the Galaxy Store… To use network storage, you need to update My Files."
"Opening the Galaxy Store… To use network storage, you need to update the Network Storage Manager."
Used to open, delete, edit, and search files and folders
"Can't open the shortcut. The original file or folder has been deleted."
Rename the file or replace the existing one?
Rename the folder or replace the existing one?
"Select how big files need to be before they're flagged when analyzing storage."
Items in the Trash will be permanently deleted after 15 days.
Security policy restricts use of SD card.
Select an item from the list on the left.
To share all the files and folders you selected, you need to use Wi-Fi Direct. Otherwise, you can just share the files you selected.
To share folders, you need to use Wi-Fi Direct.
Add files and folders to Favourites for quick access from the My Files home screen.
"The current file name contains characters that aren't supported. Rename the file to save it."
"The current file name contains characters that aren't supported."
"The current folder name contains characters that aren't supported. Rename the folder to save it."
"The current folder name contains characters that aren't supported."
Switch from %s to OneDrive to keep your important files safe and available on all your devices.
Tap here to finish switching to OneDrive.
File may be too large for the SD card
File too large to store on the SD card
File too large to store on USB device
All the files and folders in the Trash will be deleted.
"Deleted items will stay in the Trash for 30 days before they're deleted forever."
Unable to find application to perform this action.
Unable to open %s. Tap SETTINGS, then allow the following permissions and try again:
To unlock your Samsung Cloud, contact us at the website below.
Used to check how much storage space apps are using
The file extension will be changed. This may cause the file to become unusable.
